doc.title: Wo erh Han-sheng
doc.plot: A low-keyed film about a mother's relationship with her growing son. The middle-class Mrs. Pan lives in Taipei, is married to a mainlander, and has two children, her son Han-sheng and a younger daughter Han-lin. She is always worrying about Han-sheng getting good grades, passing his university entrance exams, getting the right job, his love life, and his rebellion against his home and school.
